title: Chuukou Ikkan!! Kimetsu Gakuen Monogatari: Valentine-hen
content:
“Oh wow, as if Zenitsu wasn't already down this bad.”
I feel like that was the only excuse for making this cheap short series.
A lot of shows tend to go the Picture Drama route when they get popular enough, this time, Demon Slayer, known for its explosively high budget decided to go the mile with its own Picture Drama-esque series and have fuel more funds into it, making it one of the few known, fully animated shorts of its genre, but to other shows' defense, they at least had some decent jokes to poke, unlike this sorry mess of a short. Zenitsu's annoying character treat gotannoying the first time he appear on the parent show, it clearly flew above the production's head for them to think this was wished for by the fans.
